name: Mountain Racing - Battle of Survival
description:
Mountain Racing - Battle of Survival - A tractor game.

Now Enjoy the fully physical and machine simulated game on your Apple TV and climb over difficult paths.

The game is a simulation of Tractor. It pulls different Machines and Objects Over The Bridge and goes on steep path to complete its journey.

Features:
1- Complete physical game environment.
2- Sounds.
3- Easy Controls.
4- No in App purchases (Complete game).

The game is designed for the people who love machines and it is very addictive and enjoyable especially for young kids who fond of machines like tractor.
